data.message: na-son. nasaan's lyrics look like freestyle crap out of a free pile. I'm voting lil key instead. NASAAN should change his name to NSA as in no strings attached to Saint Pat because it makes me wanna attack.

replies.message: This is what Eminem talks like in his songs right when he song writes. I plant seeds using, a bicycle n. Nine little pens. Five idiots, my little friend, rhymes fiddles n. Five riddilins, ice cycle friends, n five little twigs. How did you do that you can use bikes ta Barry. Or plant a seed what you are saying is very. Ridiculous. I can't take such a stunt serious. Is anybody hearing this, qeery shit. All you did was say you do somethun. With some stuff that doesunt. Make sense together huh huh. What the, huh, bruh. That's like I cleaned my toilet using dirt n, turds n, serpents, words, and merchants. Wow that make sense how impressive. Kidding I thought it was stupid a soon uz i read it. Eminem rhyme stunt is pathetic. So I'm not impressed em. It don't make sense em. How do you kill somone with banjo it's impossible. Your raps good but it still need to be polished bro.
